alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 8:02PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BLADEN AND ROBESON COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM EST... At 802 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pembroke, or 10 miles west of Lumberton, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Red Springs, Pembroke, Maxton, St. Pauls, Rex, Shannon, Buie, Robeson Community College, Wakulla, Elrod, Howellsville, Raemon, Tolarsville, Duart, Tobermory, Barker Ten Mile, Purvis, Prospect, and Jerome. This includes Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 5 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
